docs.lead_paragraph: The search for a brightly colored haven through hallucination-producing drugs may lead even the so-called normal person only to his particular brand of hell, according to the first large-scale study of the effect of L.S.D. on different personality types.

headline.main: Mind. Expanding Drug Studied at N.Y.U. Center; First Large-Scale Test on Normal Persons Is Made With L.S.D Compound

docs.abstract: NYU Research Center for Mental Health repts on 5-yr experiment, conducted by Dr L H Barr, on effect of LSD on normal persons; finds drug intensifies but does not change personality traits; illus
docs.snippet: The search for a brightly colored haven through hallucination-producing drugs may lead even the so-called normal person only to his particular brand of hell, according to the first large-scale study of the effect of L.S.D. on different personality...

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 8 -- The House will open debate tomorrow on a bill to shut off the illicit traffic in the so-called pep pills, goof balls and similar stimulant and depressant drugs.

headline.main: House Will Debate Legislation Aimed at Illicit Trade in Drugs

docs.abstract: HR com to open debate on bill to require distributors of barbiturates and amphetamines to keep complete records of receipts and distribution for 3 yrs, limit prescriptions validity to 6 mos and bar refilling more than 5 times without dr's authorization
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 8 -- The House will open debate tomorrow on a bill to shut off the illicit traffic in the so-called pep pills, goof balls and similar stimulant and depressant drugs.
